DOC.brief_summary: This study will assess the efficacy and safety of BGG492 used to treat migraine pain.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of BGG492 in the Treatment of Migraine
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of moderate to severe migraine for at least 1 year At least 1 migraine episode, but not more 15 migraine days per month Past use of triptans Migraine onset before 50 years of age Diagnosis of basilar, ophthalmoplegic or hemiplegic migraine. More than 6 nonmigraine headaches per month Patients receiving migraine prophylaxis treatment Patients receiving regular treatment with psychoactive drugs Smokers Patients with a very high or low body weight Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
